name: FakerIDNTest
description: Unit tests for the FakerIDN class, focusing on the toASCII method.

test_cases.name: toASCIINoError
test_cases.description: Tests the toASCII method with a valid input string, expecting no errors and the same string as output.

test_cases.name: toASCIIResultIsEmptyException
test_cases.description: Tests the toASCII method with an invalid input string, expecting a RuntimeException to be thrown.
